description: Code identifying the preventive maintenance or inspection template/program this cycle belongs to, typically reflecting equipment class or service type.
Sequence number for the cycle within the template/program, used to order or distinguish multiple cycles.
Flag for the nested PM hierarchy level of this cycle (e.g., N1), controlling bundling of tasks across progressive service levels; likely a nesting level codeâ€”confirm with SME.
User ID or username that created the cycle record.
Date and time the cycle record was created (system timestamp).
User ID or username that last modified the cycle record.
Date and time of the most recent update to the cycle record (system timestamp).
